title: Rab333's Contained Anomalies
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:minimal
|title= SCP Foundation
|subtitle=Got It?]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module CSS]]
  blockquote {
   background-color: #92b5d1 !important;
 }
[[/module]]



[[=]]
[[module CSS]]
.recolor-link a {color: #0a308a;}
.recolor-link a::visited {color: #0a308a}

[[/module]]


[[div class="blockquote"]]


**//[[span class="recolor-link"]][[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uki9u6gamMo|The Faint Knocking Of Kingdom Come]]][[/span]]//**

**//[[span class="recolor-link"]][[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uki9u6gamMo|When Only God Knows What You've Done]]][[/span]]//**

**//[[span class="recolor-link"]][[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uki9u6gamMo|Sweet Nothing In The Desert Sun]]][[/span]]//**

**//[[span class="recolor-link"]][[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uki9u6gamMo|With The Promise Of A Glass Bead Under Your Tongue]]][[/span]]//**


[[/=]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
[[div style="border: inset; border-color:#191e24; background-color:#a5cff2; border-width: 2px"]]
[[span style="font-size: 20pt"]][[[SCP-7535|SCP-7535: Tales of Gobliny]]][[/span]]
[[<]]
[[=]]
> **So stuck within the pit**
> **Amid the goblin shit**
> **He saw a hand extend**
> **To lift him up, and mend**
[[collapsible show="Info" hide="Info"]]
With [[*user Zenobiyl]] at the helm, me, him and [[*user AwhRyan]] wrote this piece out right before the gobcon deadline. It's pretty neat, the poetry is AWESOME (all the credit for that goes to Zeno and Ryan, I suck complete ass at that :p), and it's a touching story about goblin love... maybe.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/=]]
[[/<]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]


@@ @@

[[=]]
[[div style="border: inset; border-color:#191e24; background-color:#a5cff2; border-width: 2px"]]
[[span style="font-size: 20pt"]][[[SCP-6731|SCP-6731: Faustian Bargain]]][[/span]]

[[<]]
[[=]]
> **Vatican City has been assimilated into Foundation custody, with Pope Francis being nominated as the new Pope.**
[[collapsible show="Info" hide="Info"]]
This one was a doozy to write. My first article, clocking in at almost 3k words, I spent about two months writing, refining, rewriting this piece, with about a dozen people looking over it from the beginning to the end. Now, I can't say that it did too well, but I'm ecstatic for the simple fact that it survived. Who doesn't like Jesus? Who doesn't like 539 Jesuses?
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/=]]
[[/<]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

@@ @@

[[/div]]


[[=]]
[[div style="border: inset; border-color:#191e24; background-color:#a5cff2; border-width: 2px"]]
[[span style="font-size: 20pt"]][[[SCP-7897|SCP-7897: Horsepower]]][[/span]]

[[<]]
[[=]]
> **In his palace of ivory and gold, he ruled over us with an iron fist, and from death he does too.**
[[collapsible show="Info" hide="Info"]]
So far, my most successful piece, and it's the one I put comparatively the least effort in. From inception to posting it took just a few (I think three or four) short days, and people seem to have quite enjoyed it. It's also based on one of the shittiest jokes I've ever come up with, so there's that. A guy named **//Hidden Citadel//** (and **//Dr. Maxwell - SCP Readings//** too!) on Youtube did a reading of it too, so check it out!
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/=]]
[[/<]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
[[div style="border: inset; border-color:#191e24; background-color:#a5cff2; border-width: 2px"]]
[[span style="font-size: 20pt"]][[[Insignificance|]]][[/span]]
[[<]]
[[=]]
> **Oh, bother.**
[[collapsible show="Info" hide="Info"]]
This was my **Lorecon** entry, getting Dark Romanticism and Little Havana for my prompts. I think I did a good enough job on it, and I'm surprised it's gotten such a good reception from everyone despite some of the choices I took in how I wrote it. Though, definitely enjoyed writing my first tale. Poor Diego.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/=]]
[[/<]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
[[div style="border: inset; border-color:#191e24; background-color:#a5cff2; border-width: 2px"]]
[[span style="font-size: 20pt"]][[[SCP-6546|SCP-6546: Renal Riches]]][[/span]]
[[<]]
[[=]]
> **WebMD am I pissing rubies**
[[collapsible show="Info" hide="Info"]]
I was inspired to write this after I had came up with the original title for this article, //Kidney Gems//, but in the end Renal Riches is way better, lol. This one kinda got me out of a writing slump with multiple drafts in the backlog from before, and I could take my mind off them and write this thing. Even if it was really bizarre, the concept that is - it was a blast to write. 
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/=]]
[[/<]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
[[div style="border: inset; border-color:#191e24; background-color:#a5cff2; border-width: 2px"]]
[[span style="font-size: 15pt"]][[[SCP-7718|SCP-7718: That person you knew once from that one period in your life]]][[/span]]
[[<]]
[[=]]
> **Say, you'd be up for a beer later? It's on me, for old times sake.**
[[collapsible show="Info" hide="Info"]]
After struggling with another idea for **Remixcon** for a while, I decided to say fuck it and try to tackle something else. Lo and behold, after just a few hours, I had this one out. It's short and sweet and full of good vibes. Good friends are indispensable, don't forget that.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/=]]
[[/<]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]


@@ @@

[[=]]
[[div style="border: inset; border-color:#191e24; background-color:#a5cff2; border-width: 2px"]]
[[span style="font-size: 20pt"]][[[SCP-7448|SCP-7448: One Step Forward, Four Billion Steps Back]]][[/span]]
[[<]]
[[=]]
> **Despite attempts to negate this, D-55435's body had grown to a final size of 19m^^2^^**.
[[collapsible show="Info" hide="Info"]]
The idea popped into my head and I knew I had to write it, this was the first time I attempted to do actual horror for this site, lol. It didn't get a lot of attention or anything but I had fun writing it and I'm pretty proud of it, so it is what it is sometimes.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/=]]
[[/<]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
[[div style="border: inset; border-color:#191e24; background-color:#a5cff2; border-width: 2px"]]
[[span style="font-size: 20pt"]][[[SCP-7358|SCP-7358: Equus Fatum]]][[/span]]

[[<]]
[[=]]
> **Ștefan: …Are you God?**
[[collapsible show="Info" hide="Info"]]
This article got me out of a writing slump and also appeared pretty spontaneously in my head, I'm surprised I managed to weave all the weird little things together in it seamlessly enough for it to work as well as it did. It also got featured on the main page, and that's a first! Really happy with how this one turned out.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/=]]
[[/<]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
[[div style="border: inset; border-color:#191e24; background-color:#a5cff2; border-width: 2px"]]
[[span style="font-size: 20pt"]][[[SCP-7803|SCP-7803: To The Tune of The Shroom]]][[/span]]
[[<]]
[[=]]
> **Reports from former Minnesota Twins players suggest that SCP-7803-1 had started uncontrollably sobbing for an extended period of time after the game.**
[[collapsible show="Info" hide="Info"]]
ART EXCHANGE ART EXCHANGE. This one was a fun piece to write out for [[*user Pab07]]! Divine inspiration struck me and I knew what had to be done. Fun micro-short piece, one to put under your Christmas tree.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/=]]
[[/<]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
[[div style="border: inset; border-color:#191e24; background-color:#a5cff2; border-width: 2px"]]
[[span style="font-size: 20pt"]][[[SCP-7259|SCP-7259: Zero Zero]]][[/span]]
[[<]]
[[=]]
> **Out of the souls located inside SCP-7259, ~110 billion belong to humans. The origin of the remaining ~388 billion souls is currently unknown.**
[[collapsible show="Info" hide="Info"]]
This idea just kept pestering me until I decided it was enough and wrote it all down. I'm pretty satisfied with the result, though I need to get better at these short horror-ish stories since currently I seem quite lacking in that regard. Oh well.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/=]]
[[/<]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

author: Rab333
